content: one handled hanging basket elv needleworks one handled hanging basket what you will need ● size n crochet hook ● approx 40 yards of seven different worsted weight yarns terms you should know magic_ring chain - chain stitch slip_stitch - slip_stitch single_crochet - single_crochet all terms are us terms page 2 elv needleworks ©2023 one handled hanging basket pattern this pattern is worked by holding together seven different strands of worsted weight yarn at once all the way through this is a great project to use up some of your smaller balls of yarn size s row 1 work 10 single_crochet into a magic_ring slip_stitch to first single_crochet 10 stitches row 2 ch1 2sc into each single_crochet slip_stitch into first single_crochet 20 stitches row chain 1 single_crochet around slip_stitch into first single_crochet 20 stitches 3-10 row 11 chain 1 single_crochet in next 11 stitches this will leave 9 stitches unworked turn 11 stitches row 12 ch1 single_crochet in next 9 stitches this will leave 2 stitches unworked turn 9 stitches row 13 ch1 single_crochet in next 7 stitches this will neave 2 stitches unworked turn 7 stitches row 14 ch1 single_crochet in next 5 stitches this will leave 2 stitches unworked turn 5 stitches row 15 ch1 single_crochet in next stitch ch5 skip next 3 stitches single_crochet this single_crochet will be in the last stitch from row 14 single_crochet in the two missed stitches from row 12 single_crochet in the 9 missed stitches from row 10 single_crochet in the two missed stitches in row 11 single_crochet in the two missed stitches from row 13 22 stitches page 3 elv needleworks ©2023 one handled hanging basket row 16 single_crochet in first stitch 7sc into the gap created by the chain and skipped stitches slip_stitch into the first single_crochet after the chain stitches tie off size m row 1 work 10 single_crochet into a magic loop slip_stitch to first single_crochet 10 stitches row 2 ch1 2sc into each single_crochet slip_stitch
